rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Set Custom Asset Status To Cancelled

rules.name: myRule_7

rules.name: myRule_10
rules.label: Set Custom Asset Status To Pending Activation

Flow.description: Updates Order line status to Rejected & asset line statuses based on orderline status and delete the Rejected orderline record

value.stringValue: AND ( ISCHANGED([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Item_Status__c), [Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Item_Status__c = $Label.OrderLineItemStatusRejected, OR( AND( [Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c != NULL, ISCHANGED([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c), TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> NULL, TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> $Label.WorkOrderStatusClosed, TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> $Label.WorkOrderStatusCompleted, TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> $Label.WorkOrderStatusReopenRequested, TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> $Label.WO_Order_Status_Reopened, TEXT([Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c.SVMXC__Order_Status__c) <> $Label.CaseStatusClosedDuplicate ), [Apttus_Config2__OrderLineItem__c].Apttus_Config2__OrderId__c.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__c.Work_Order__c = NULL ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression: AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Item_Status__c}), {!myVariable_current.Item_Status__c} = {!$Label.OrderLineItemStatusRejected}, OR( AND( {!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__c} != NULL, ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> NULL, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> {!$Label.WorkOrderStatusClosed}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> {!$Label.WorkOrderStatusCompleted}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> {!$Label.WorkOrderStatusReopenRequested}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> {!$Label.WO_Order_Status_Reopened}, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__r.SVMXC__Order_Status__c}) <> {!$Label.CaseStatusClosedDuplicate} ), {!myVariable_current.Apttus_Config2__OrderId__r.Apttus_Config2__RelatedOpportunityId__r.Work_Order__c} = NULL ) )

Flow.label: Order Line Item: Update Status To Rejected And Delete Rejected Records
